text: In nomine patris et filii et spiritus sancti.Ceolred abbot & ða higan on Medeshamstede sellað Wulfrede ðet land æt Sempingaham in ðas gerednisse, ðet he hit h<../images/etail.gif>bbe & bruce sua lange sua he life & anum ærfeuuarde æfter him & elce gere sextig foðra wuda to ð<../images/etail.gif>m ham on Hornan ðæm wuda & tuelf foðer græfan & sex foður gerda.
End forðon we him ðis land sellað ðet he ðes landes fulne friodom bigete in ece ærfeweardnisse æt Sempingaham & æt Slioforda.
& bruce þere cirican lafard on Medeshamstede ðes landes æt Slioforda & Wulfred ðes on Sempingaham.

& he geselle eghwelce gere to Medeshamstede tua tunnan fulle luhtres aloh & tua slegneat & s<../images/etail.gif>x hund lafes & ten mittan W<../images/etail.gif>lsces aloð & þere cirican laforde geselle eghwelce gere hors & ðrittig scillinga & hine ane niht gefeormige, fiftene mitta luhtres aloðVmitta welsces aloð fiftene sestras liðes.
& hi sion symle in allum here life eadmode & hearsume & underþeodde.
& ofer here tuega d<../images/etail.gif>g þonne agefe hio þet land into þere cirican to Medeshamstede mid freodome.
& we him þis sellað mid felda & mid wuda & mid fenne sua þerto belimpeð.
Sið heora tuuege dæg agan sie þonne agefe mon tuuenti hida higuum to biodland & þere cirican lafeardeXIIhida land æt Forde & æt Cegle.
& he wes feormied tuuege hida landes æt L<../images/etail.gif>hcotum his erfeweorda sweolcum swelce him ðonne gesibbast were & þat were fulfredes cynne ge fre swa sua þet oðer into þere cirican.
Anno uero dominice incarnationis DCCCLII Indictione XV hoc factum est.Her sindan ða naman ðere monna þe þis wreotan & festnedan.
Ic Ceolred abbod þas ure selene mid Cristes rodetacne trymme & festnie.
